body_html:
I encountered the same issue with Tensorflow releases 1.11 and 1.12

Update: I switched to bazel 0.18, python 3.5, tensorflow 1.12, uninstalled all libc-ares packages, ran ./configure and then built with bazel build --config=opt --config=cuda //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package. Now when running your bazel test I'm seeing test failures but the build completes successfully.
body_text:
I encountered the same issue with Tensorflow releases 1.11 and 1.12
Update: I switched to bazel 0.18, python 3.5, tensorflow 1.12,  uninstalled all libc-ares packages, ran ./configure and then built with bazel build --config=opt --config=cuda //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package. Now when running your bazel test I'm seeing test failures but the build completes successfully.
body:
I encountered the same issue with Tensorflow releases 1.11 and 1.12

Update: I switched to bazel 0.18, python 3.5, tensorflow 1.12,  uninstalled all libc-ares packages, ran `./configure` and then built with `bazel build --config=opt --config=cuda //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package`. Now when running your `bazel test` I'm seeing test failures but the build completes successfully.
